author: thomreis
body:
#### PR description:

This PR changes the EcalUncalibRecHitSoAToLegacy from a stream to a global module as suggested [here](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/46453#discussion_r1857362953).
In addition the parameter names for inputs and output labels are simplified and aligned to changes in the equivalent module of the calibrated rechit module as mentioned in [this comment](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/46453#discussion_r1857377161).

#### PR validation:

Passes 12834.412.
title: ECAL - Make EcalUncalibRecHitSoAToLegacy a global module
